channel.title: Godot on GDQuest
channel.description: Recent content in Godot on GDQuest

item.title: Godot course: available content
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: Last update: August 30 The course is still in early access, with currently 11/12 chapters available in the Pro version. The course comes in 3 versions. Indie contains all of Hobby, and Pro contains all chapters and extra resources: Hobby Indie Pro If you’re only looking for UI tutorials, check out our standalone course: Create User Interface Godot Course You’ll find some free tutorial samples below.
